EmailTemplate.name: CIDD- Custodian request to onboard
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
_ has requested to set up the below funds for doc delivery. Please confirm the custodial relationship, and that you agree to onboard for CIDD.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} | CIDD Support 711 Executive Blvd., Suite A | Valley Cottage, New York 10989 Support: +1 646 690 4291 Main: +1 646 690 4300 LSMDocDelivery@markit.com {!Case.Thread_Id}
